title: Formosa Food
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, International, Asian
description: A little vegetarian restaurant and shop offering mostly vegan Asian food with some other varieties like curry, schnitzel made with soy, veggie burgers and fries. Has vegan desserts. Previously vegan-friendly, now nearly 100% vegan (two items vegetarian) as confirmed by the owner as of May 2011. The shop area sells frozen vegetarian and vegan meat substitutes and even vegan dog food. Located in a quiet side street of the main shopping street Mariahilfstr.
